original: apply refined_raft_net_invariant_init. intros net. unfold votes_correct. split. - intros h t n n' Hin1 Hin2. destruct (vlcti net h t n) as [Hle1 | Hnin1]. + eapply votes_le_currentTerm in Hin1; eauto. eapply votes_le_currentTerm in Hin2; eauto. lia. + exfalso; eauto. - split. + intros h t n Hin Heq Hvotes. destruct (vlcti net h t n) as [Hle | Hnin]. * eapply votes_le_currentTerm in Hin; eauto. lia. * exfalso; eauto. + intros h t n Heq Hvoted. destruct (vlcti net h t n) as [Hle | Hnin]. * eapply votes_le_currentTerm in Hle; eauto. lia. * exfalso; eauto.
